question: A curious goldfish approaches you. It swims around you and the stops right in front of you.
win: The golfish stares at you as you pet it. You can kind of make out a faint blush...But fish don't blush, right?
lose: In the goldfish's eyes you see a faint glimmer of horror and disgust. It swims away.

question: A humongous barramundi approaches you. You are around 60% of it's length. This fish must be some big shot with that size!
win: The barramundi becomes incredibly interested in you. As the biggest CEO fish around, it has never seen someone ignore it.
lose: The barramundi immediately closes in and...starts eating you! It's a fierce battle and you end up surviving after they find other prey.

question: The angel fish swims excitedly around you, almost as if it recognizes you! It's asking you for food now too!
win: The angel fish immediatlely lights up and swims around you. It seems to be your childhood fish buddy!
lose: The angel fish becomes dejected and immediately leaves. Just before it left it asked if you remembered your promise together and then cried at your confusion.

question: A clownfish approaches you and asks if you've seen his son.

answers.answerText: Yes, he was taken over there

win: The clownfish cheers and thanks you before swimming off. As you look down you see a piece of seaweed with his number.
lose: The clownfish frowns, tells you off and threatens to call your parents, and storms off.

question: You're waiting for your fish date when a catfish shows up and claims they're your fish date!

answers.answerText: You look different in your pictures...
You're even better than I imagined!

win: As the catfish blushes and smiles, you see them throw something away. It looks like a knife. The catfish drags you away to learn more about you
lose: You see a dangerous glint in their eyes before they smile and excuse themselves. When you go back home you find you left your door open by accident. Or did you?

question: An olive barb accidentally bumps into you.

answers.answerText: Ew...I wouldn't even want you in my aquarium

win: As they light up they tell you all sorts of things about their day. Before running off, they kiss your cheek while blushing
lose: The olive barb pales and runs away before you can push him into the sand

question: While in fish prison for swimming too fast you meet a sheephead.

answers.answerText: Stay away from them for now

win: The sheephead appreciates your calm nature, despite you not actually being calm and just scared
lose: A growl escapes their mouth before lunging at you with their teeth! You can now officially say you've been bitten by a fish!

question: A dolphin excitedly makes it's way towards you and passes you a pufferfish
win: They smirk at you, happy you got the memo. You guys spend some time puffing on some pufferfish
lose: The dolphin is disappointed at how uptight you are. It swims away calling you a killjoy

question: A Magikarp swims towards you and splashes! It has no effect...

answers.answerText: Run away and try for another one

win: The Magikarp splashes even more. They subtly tell you that they will evolve into a Gyarados like all their family and be rich enough to support you
lose: They stare at you as you run away. They stop splashing and go on a journey to become the very best that no one ever was

question: A tilapia slowly swims by. It then stops and looks at you before offering you a strawberry candy fish pellet

answers.answerText: Accept the candy and help them cross the algae

win: They smile as you escort them and when you're done the squeeze your cheeks and swim away
lose: The tilapia is sad, but understands that it's good to know about stranger danger. They swim away sadly and slowly

question: A menacing shark approaches you. They smirk as they start hitting on you

answers.answerText: Scream in terror and swim away

win: The shark begins to blush and trip on their words. They swim away out of embarrassment
lose: They frown and roll their eyes. Yet another person who judges based on looks and outdated movies

question: You see an octopus crunching some numbers while in a small jar
win: The octopus thanks you and you stay there helping them until they solve the problem. They get out of the jar and ask if you want to work with them some time soon
lose: As you break the container the octopus stares at you before storming off. You could have sworn they also called you stupid

question: A jellyfish slowly floats by asking you to help them move a certain direction

answers.answerText: Agree and cause a few waves to push them

win: The jellyfish appreciates you didn't touch them since it could have seriosuly hurt you
lose: You immediately get stung and are rushed to the hospital where your doctor calls you crazy for trying to romance fish

question: A shrimp goes by and asks if you know your away around the fish city
win: The shrimp smiles at you before giving you some home grown algae from where they come from
lose: You see them deflate before going somewhere randomly

question: You come across starfish who is stuck under some rubble and can't move. They ask for help and urgently because they need to catch their current

answers.answerText: Cut off the limb that's stuck

win: The starfish thanks you and exchanges contact information with you. They tell you not to worry because their limbs will regrow
lose: You take your time getting them out and they thank you, but they look upset. They missed their current
